main event: An observer reported seeing an unidentified flying object hovering about 50 ft off the ground while driving in Lake City, Missouri.
interesting points: The object was oval in shape., The observer's automobile engine died when he approached the object., The event took place around 1 a.m. on November 2, 1957., The sighting was reported third-hand, as the observer intended to keep it private., The case was marked as insufficient data for evaluation.
witness description: The witness was driving from work and is connected through a third party.
